climbs.name: His & Hers
climbs.fa: FA Nikki Taylor and "Dustin de Jong, July 15 2019

content.description:
His 5.7 - follows the natural crack/groove up and then right to a slight ledge system under the mild overhang. From the ledge under the overhang move up and right to the rapp anchors of the neighboring climb. Continue up and slightly left on un-protected low 5th to a tree wrapped with 2 new slings.

Hers 5.8 - Starts right of "His" start. 5.8 crux first move, then easing off to 5.7. Forge straight up the face until the right facing finger crack allows for a first placement ~15ft up. Connect with His on the slight ledge system under the mild overhang, and work your way up past the neighboring climb's rapp anchor to 2 options unprotected low 5th to the tree wrapped with 2 fresh slings

Note: Alpine feel! Though we removed many loose rocks, a loose rock before the overhang, and one after may pose danger if truly reefed on, but were too difficult for us to remove.

Trad
A small secluded wall above Cosmic Lights / Schoolyard
